text:
e="preserve">Anthony James (born James Anthony; July 22, 1942 – May 26, 2020) was an American actor. He was known for playing villain in Western movies or television series. He was born in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
His movie roles include: "P.J." (1968) and "...tick...tick...tick..." (1970). He played one of the lynch mobsters in "High Plains Drifter" and appeared the horror movie "Burnt Offerings" (1976). He had roles in "Blue Thunder" (1983), " Nightmares" (1983), and ' (1991).
James died on May 26, 2020 of cancer, aged 77.
